conclusion: Analyze the flow path of the liquid from each inlet through the baffles.
Inlet A: Liquid flows downward and to the right, passing through the red baffle.
Liquid continues downward and to the right, passing through the green baffle.
Liquid from Inlet A flows into container E.
Inlet B: Liquid flows downward and to the right, passing through the green baffle.
Liquid continues downward and to the right, passing through the gray baffle.
Liquid from Inlet B flows into container E.
Inlet C: Liquid flows downward and to the right, passing through the gray baffle.
Liquid continues downward and to the right, passing through the pink baffle.
Liquid from Inlet C flows into container F.
Inlet D: Liquid flows downward and to the right, passing through the pink baffle.
Liquid continues downward and to the right, passing through the black baffle.
Liquid from Inlet D flows into container F.
Inlets A and B flow into container E.
Inlets C and D flow into container F.
